places.name: Hiltl
places.description: World's oldest vegetarian restaurant. Great lunch buffet.
places.notes: Try the Indian section of the buffet

places.name: Zeughauskeller
places.description: Traditional Swiss restaurant in historic armory building.
places.notes: Good for groups, classic Zurich experience

places.name: Café Sprüngli
places.description: Famous for Luxemburgerli macarons and hot chocolate.

places.name: Zürich HB
places.description: Main train station. Connections to everywhere.
places.notes: Good food hall in the basement

places.name: Stadelhofen
places.description: S-Bahn station near lake and old town.

places.name: Bürkliplatz Ferry
places.description: Lake ferry terminal. Great for day trips.
places.notes: Take the boat to Rapperswil on sunny days

places.name: Migros Löwenstrasse
places.description: Large Migros near HB. Good prepared foods.

places.name: Lindenhof
places.description: Hilltop park with views over old town and river.

places.name: Kunsthaus Zürich
places.description: Major art museum. Monet, Picasso, Giacometti.

places.name: Polyterrasse ETH
places.description: Best viewpoint in the city. Take the Polybahn up.
places.notes: The funicular is a fun experience

places.name: Uetliberg Summit
places.description: Zurich's local mountain. Train goes to top.
places.notes: Walk the ridge to Felsenegg, take cable car down

places.name: Käferberg Forest
places.description: Easy forest walks north of the city.
places.notes: Good for a quick nature break
